title: The Girl in the Little Blue Dress
description: When a 3-year-old named Michelle Pulsifer disappeared, her father couldn't even get police to search for her -- but he never gave up looking. John Larson reports in this Dateline classic. Originally aired on NBC on July 19, 2009.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
